GPUUncapturedErrorEvent.summary: The GPUUncapturedErrorEvent interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} is the event object type for the event, used for telemetry and to report unexpected errors.

remarks.para: Known error cases should be handled using and .

-The WebGPU API
-WebGPU Error Handling best practices

GPUUncapturedErrorEventError.summary:
The error read-only property of the
interface is a object instance providing access to the details of the error.

remarks.para:
-The WebGPU API
-WebGPU Error Handling best practices

GPUUncapturedErrorEventGPUUncapturedErro.summary:
The GPUUncapturedErrorEvent() constructor creates a new
object instance.
